entities.instruction:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<RegularExpression name="Israel National ID" pattern="\b\d{9}\b" validationOperator="or"/>
entities.name: Israel National ID
entities.description: Nine digits

entities.instruction:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<RegularExpression name="Chile Identity Card Number" pattern="\b\d{1,2}\.\d{3}\.\d{3}-[\dA-Za-z]{1}\b" validationOperator="or"/>
entities.name: Chile Identity Card
entities.description: 7-8 digits plus delimiters a check digit or letter

entities.instruction:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<RegularExpression name="EU Debit Card Number" pattern="\b\d{16}\b" validationOperator="or"/>
entities.name: EU Debit Card Number
entities.description: 16 digits

entities.instruction:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<RegularExpression name="Finland National ID" pattern="\b\d{6}[-+a]{1}\d{3}[\dA-Za-z]{1}\b" validationOperator="or"/>
entities.name: Finland National ID
entities.description: Six digits plus a character indicating a century plus three digits plus a check digit

entities.instruction:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<RegularExpression name="France Social Security Number (INSEE)" pattern="\b(\d{13}\s\d{2})|(\d{15})\b" validationOperator="or"/>
entities.name: France INSEE
entities.description: 15 digits

entities.instruction:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><RegularExpression name="Australian TFN" pattern="(\b)(?!0{3}(\s|-)?0{3}(\s|-)?0{3}(\s|-)?)\d{3}(\s|-)?\d{3}(\s|-)?\d{3}(\b)" validationOperator="or">
<Validator context="100" name="Australian TFN Validator" type="jruby"></Validator>
</RegularExpression>
entities.name: Australian TFN
entities.description: The Australian TFN is a 9 digit number that has a checksum digit.

entities.instruction:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<RegularExpression name="France Driver's License Number" pattern="\b\d{12}\b" validationOperator="or"/>
entities.name: France Driver's Lic
entities.description: 12 digits

entities.instruction:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<RegularExpression name="TC032-non-mac-address-expanded" pattern="\b(\d{1,6}[ab]?)(\s+([A-Z][a-zA-Z]*){1,2})(\s+([aA]venue|[Cc]ourt|[Cc]t|[Dd]rive|[Dd]r|[Ll]ane|[Ll]n|[Pp]lace|[Rr]oad|[Rr]d|[Ss]treet|[Ss]t)\.?)(((\s+)?,?\s+)([A-Z][a-zA-Z]*){1,2})(((\s+)?,?\s+)((TAS|Tasmania|TASMANIA)|(VIC|Victoria|VICTORIA)|(NSW|New South Wales|NEW SOUTH WALES)|(QLD|Queensland|QUEENSLAND)|(SA|South Australia|SOUTH AUSTRALIA)|(NT|Northern Territory|NORTHERN TERRITORY)|(WA|Western Australia|WESTERN AUSTRALIA)))?(((\s+)?,?\s+)(\d{4}))?\b" validationOperator="or">
<Validator context="10" name="TC032-address-validator-expanded" type="jruby"></Validator>
</RegularExpression>
entities.name: TC032-non-mac-addr

entities.instruction:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<RegularExpression name="French CNI" pattern="(^|s)(d{12})($|s|.s)" validationOperator="or"/>
entities.name: French CNI

entities.instruction:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<RegularExpression name="Italy Drivers License Number" pattern="(^|s)(D{1}[^b-uw-zB-UW-Z])((w{7})(D))($|s|.s)" validationOperator="or"/>
entities.name: Italy Driver's Lic

entities.instruction:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<RegularExpression name="ABA Routing Number" pattern="\b[123678]\d{3}-{0,1}\d{4}-{0,1}\d\b" validationOperator="or"/>
entities.name: ABA Routing Number
entities.description: 9 digits which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern

entities.instruction:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<RegularExpression name="Israel Bank Account Number" pattern="(^|s)(d{2}-d{3}-d{8}|d{13})($|s|.s)" validationOperator="or"/>
entities.name: Israel Bank Account

entities.instruction:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<RegularExpression name="Australian Telephone Number" pattern="(^|(?<=\W))(\+61|\(?0)(\s|-)?([2..8])\)?(\s|-)?(\d{4})(\s|-)?(\d{4})|(0|\+61(\s|-)?)4\d{2}(\s|-)?\d{3}(\s|-)?\d{3}($|(?=\W))" validationOperator="or"/>
entities.name: Australian Telephone
entities.description: Australian Telephone Number Format.

entities.instruction:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<RegularExpression name="Finland Passport Number" pattern="\b[A-Za-z]{2}\d{7}\b" validationOperator="or"/>
entities.name: Finland Passport
entities.description: Combination of nine letters and digits

entities.instruction:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<RegularExpression name="Email Addresses" pattern="[\+a-zA-Z0-9_.-]{1,64}@[a-zA-Z0-9-]{1,256}\.[a-zA-Z0-9-.]{1,256}\b" validationOperator="or"/>
entities.name: Email Addresses
entities.description: A complete regular expression is extremely complex and time consuming to run as documented here: http://ex-parrot.com/~pdw/Mail-RFC822-Address.html so the one provided here is fast to run while handling most of the common ones

entities.instruction:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<RegularExpression name="United Kingdom ID Number" pattern="\b(?!000)([0-6]\d{2}|7([0-6]\d|7[012]))([ -]?)(?!00)\d\d\3(?!0000)\d{4}\b" validationOperator="or"/>
entities.name: UK ID Number

entities.instruction:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<RegularExpression name="Greece National ID Card" pattern="\b(\D-\d{6})|(\w{2}-\d{6})\b" validationOperator="or"/>
entities.name: Greece National ID
entities.description: Combination of 7-8 letters and numbers plus a dash

entities.instruction:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<RegularExpression name="Money" pattern="[A-Z]{0,3}[$\u00A3\u20ac](?:0|[1-9]\d{0,2}(?:[.,]?\d{3}){0,10})[,.]?\d{0,2}(\b|_)" validationOperator="or"/>
entities.name: Money
entities.description: File containing regular expressions for money. Matches US and European formats with a leading dollar, pound or euro sign.

entities.instruction:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<RegularExpression name="Brazil National ID Card (RG)" pattern="\b(\d{2}\.\d{3}\.\d{3}-\d)|(\d{10}-\d)\b" validationOperator="or"/>
entities.name: Brazil ID (RG)

entities.instruction:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<RegularExpression name="United Kingdom Licence Plate" pattern="\b([A-Z]{3}\s?(\d{3}|\d{2}|d{1})\s?[A-Z])|([A-Z]\s?(\d{3}|\d{2}|\d{1})\s?[A-Z]{3})|(([A-HK-PRSVWY][A-HJ-PR-Y])\s?([0][2-9]|[1-9][0-9])\s?[A-HJ-PR-Z]{3})\b" validationOperator="or"/>
entities.name: UK Licence Plate

entities.instruction:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<RegularExpression name="Hong Kong Identity Card (HKID) Number" pattern="\b[A-Za-z]{1,2}\d{6}[\dA]{1}\b" validationOperator="or"/>
entities.name: Hong Kong HKID
entities.description: Combination of 8-9 letters and numbers plus optional parentheses around the final character

entities.instruction:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<RegularExpression name="Canada Passport Number" pattern="\b[A-Z]{2}\d{6}\b" validationOperator="or"/>
entities.name: Canada Passport
entities.description: Two uppercase letters followed by six digits

entities.instruction:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<RegularExpression name="France Passport Number" pattern="\b\d{2}[A-Za-z]{2}\d{5}\b" validationOperator="or"/>
entities.name: France Passport
entities.description: Nine digits and letters

entities.instruction:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<RegularExpression name="URL" pattern="(http|https|ftp)\://[a-zA-Z0-9\-\.]+\.[a-zA-Z]{2,3}(:[a-zA-Z0-9]*)?/?([a-zA-Z0-9\-\._\?\,\'/\\\+&amp;%\$#\=~])*[^\.\,\)\(\s]\b" validationOperator="or"/>
entities.name: URL
entities.description: File containing regular expressions to match URLs.  Again, this regexp is a trade-off of obtaining most URLs in an efficient manner rather than being 100% complete.

entities.instruction:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<RegularExpression name="United Kingdom National INS Code" pattern="\b[A-CEGHJ-PR-TW-Z]{1}[A-CEGHJ-NPR-TW-Z]{1}[0-9]{6}[A-DFM]{0,1}\b" validationOperator="or"/>
entities.name: UK National INS Code

entities.instruction:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<RegularExpression name="India Permanent Account Number" pattern="\b[A-Za-z]{5}\d{4}\w{1}\b" validationOperator="or"/>
entities.name: India Permanent Acc
entities.description: 10 letters or digits

entities.instruction:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<RegularExpression name="India Unique Identification (Aadhaar) Number" pattern="\b\d{4}\s{0,1}\d{4}\s{0,1}\d\b" validationOperator="or"/>
entities.name: India Aadhaar
entities.description: 12 digits containing optional spaces or dashes

entities.instruction:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><RegularExpression name="Person Name" pattern="(\p{javaUpperCase}[\p{javaLowerCase}']{1,25}\.?)((([\ \-])([aeou][dlr]-|ibn |bin )?(\p{javaUpperCase}.?'?\p{javaUpperCase}?[\p{javaLowerCase}']{0,25})){0,12})(?=\b|_)" validationOperator="or">
<Validator type="personName"/>
</RegularExpression>
entities.name: Person Name
entities.description: Located Person Names.

entities.instruction:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<RegularExpression name="Australia Passport Number" pattern="\b[A-Za-z]\d{7}\b" validationOperator="or"/>
entities.name: Australia Passport
entities.description: A letter followed by seven digits

entities.instruction:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<RegularExpression name="German Identity Card Number" pattern="\b([A-Za-z]{1}\d{8})|(\d{10})\b" validationOperator="or"/>
entities.name: German Identity Card

entities.instruction:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<RegularExpression name="United Kingdom Bank Sort Code" pattern="\b[0-9]{2}[-][0-9]{2}[-][0-9]{2}\b" validationOperator="or"/>
entities.name: UK Bank Sort Code

entities.instruction:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><RegularExpression name="Personal ID [Validated]" pattern="(?!9|666|000)\d{3}([-| ]?)(?!00)\d{2}\1(?!0000)\d{4}(?=\b|_)" validationOperator="or">
<Validator type="ssn"/>
</RegularExpression>
entities.name: Valid Personal ID

entities.instruction:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<RegularExpression name="Czech National Identity Card Number" pattern="\b\d{6}/\d{4}\b" validationOperator="or"/>
entities.name: Czech Identity Card
entities.description: 10 digits containing a forward slash

entities.instruction:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<RegularExpression name="Belgium National Number" pattern="\b\d{2}\.\d{2}\.\d{2}-([13579]{3}|[02468]{3})\.\d{2} " validationOperator="or"/>
entities.name: Belgium National No
entities.description: 11 digits plus delimiters

entities.name: Post Code-State (AU)
entities.description:
This will identify PostCode and State (Abbreviations) which occure within 5 spaces of each other, with the state abbreviations either proceeding or preceeding the post code.

Post codes are only valid if they conform to the value range for the given state.

entities.instruction:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<RegularExpression name="Brazil CPF Number" pattern="\b\d{3}\.\d{3}\.\d{3}-\d{2}\b" validationOperator="or"/>
entities.name: Brazil CPF
entities.description: 11 digits that include a check digit and can be formatted or unformatted

entities.instruction:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<RegularExpression name="Countries" pattern="(?=[a-zA-ZåÅ])([sS](?:o(?:uth (?:[gG]eorgia and the [sS]outh [sS]andwich [iI]slands|[aA]frica|[sS]udan)|lomon [iI]slands|malia)|a(?:int (?:[vV]incent and the [gG]renadines|[pP]ierre and [mM]iquelon|[kK]itts and [nN]evis|[bB]arthélemy|[hH]elena|[mM]artin|[lL]ucia)|o [tT]ome and [pP]rincipe|udi [aA]rabia|n [mM]arino|moa)|valbard and [jJ]an [mM]ayen|yrian [aA]rab [rR]epublic|i(?:erra [lL]eone|n(?:t [mM]aarten|gapore))|w(?:itzerland|aziland|eden)|e(?:ychelles|negal|rbia)|ri [lL]anka|lov(?:akia|enia)|u(?:riname|dan)|pain)|[uU](?:nited (?:[sS]tates(?: [mM]inor [oO]utlying [iI]slands|)|[aA]rab [eE]mirates|[kK]ingdom)|zbekistan|kraine|ruguay|ganda)|[hH](?:eard [iI]sland and [mM]cdonald [iI]slands|o(?:n(?:g [kK]ong|duras)|ly [sS]ee)|ungary|aiti)|[dD](?:e(?:mocratic [rR]epublic of the [cC]ongo|nmark)|ominica(?:n [rR]epublic|)|jibouti)|[lL](?:a(?:o [pP]eople's [dD]emocratic [rR]epublic|tvia)|i(?:b(?:yan [aA]rab [jJ]amahiriya|eria)|echtenstein|thuania)|uxembourg|e(?:banon|sotho))|[bB](?:r(?:itish [iI]ndian [oO]cean [tT]erritory|unei [dD]arussalam|azil)|o(?:snia(?: and [hH]erzegovina|)|uvet [iI]sland|tswana|livia|naire)|u(?:r(?:kina [fF]aso|undi)|lgaria)|a(?:ngladesh|rbados|h(?:amas|rain))|e(?:l(?:arus|gium|ize)|rmuda|nin)|hutan)|[fF](?:r(?:ench (?:[sS]outhern [tT]erritories|[pP]olynesia|[gG]uiana)|ance)|a(?:lkland [iI]slands|roe [iI]slands)|i(?:nland|ji))|[cC](?:entral [aA]frican [rR]epublic|o(?:cos (?:\([kK]eeling\) [iI]slands|[iI]slands)|ok [iI]slands|sta [rR]ica|lombia|moros|ngo)|h(?:ristmas [iI]sland|i(?:le|na)|ad)|a(?:yman [iI]slands|pe [vV]erde|m(?:bodia|eroon)|nada)|zech [rR]epublic|ôte [dD]'[iI]voire|roatia|u(?:raçao|ba)|yprus)|[nN](?:or(?:thern [mM]ariana [iI]slands|folk [iI]sland|way)|e(?:w (?:[cC]aledonia|[zZ]ealand)|therlands|pal)|i(?:caragua|ger(?:ia|)|ue)|a(?:mibia|uru))|[tT](?:u(?:rk(?:s and [cC]aicos [iI]slands|menistan|ey)|nisia|valu)|rinidad and [tT]obago|imor\-[lL]este|a(?:jikistan|nzania|iwan)|hailand|o(?:kelau|nga|go))|[pP](?:a(?:l(?:estin(?:ian [tT]erritories|e)|au)|pua [nN]ew [gG]uinea|kistan|raguay|nama)|hilippines|uerto [rR]ico|itcairn|o(?:rtugal|land)|eru)|[aA](?:n(?:t(?:igua and [bB]arbuda|arctica)|g(?:uilla|ola)|dorra)|merican [sS]amoa|fghanistan|zerbaijan|r(?:gentina|menia|uba)|ustr(?:alia|ia)|l(?:bania|geria))|[rR](?:ussian [fF]ederation|omania|éunion|wanda)|[eE](?:quatorial [gG]uinea|l [sS]alvador|thiopia|cuador|ritrea|stonia|gypt)|[wW](?:allis and [fF]utuna|estern [sS]ahara)|[mM](?:a(?:r(?:shall [iI]slands|tinique)|dagascar|urit(?:ania|ius)|c(?:edonia|ao)|l(?:a(?:ysia|wi)|dives|vinas|ta|i)|yotte)|icronesia|o(?:n(?:t(?:enegro|serrat)|golia|aco)|zambique|ldova|rocco)|yanmar|exico)|[kK](?:e(?:eling [iI]slands|nya)|azakhstan|yrgyzstan|iribati|uwait|orea)|[vV](?:i(?:rgin [iI]slands|etnam)|enezuela|anuatu)|[gG](?:u(?:inea(?:\-[bB]issau|)|a(?:deloupe|temala|m)|ernsey|yana)|ibraltar|re(?:e(?:nland|ce)|nada)|e(?:orgia|rmany)|a(?:mbia|bon)|hana)|[åÅ]land [iI]slands|[iI](?:s(?:le Of [mM]an|rael)|nd(?:onesia|ia)|celand|r(?:eland|a(?:n|q))|taly)|[zZ](?:imbabwe|ambia)|[jJ](?:a(?:maica|pan)|ersey|ordan)|[qQ]atar|[yY]emen|[oO]man)\b" validationOperator="or"/>
entities.name: Countries
entities.description: Matches proper-cased country names roughly matching ISO 3166-1

entities.instruction:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<RegularExpression name="IP Addresses" pattern="(?=\d)(?:(?:25[0-5]|2[0-4][0-9]|[01]?[0-9][0-9]?)\.){3}(?:25[0-5]|2[0-4][0-9]|[01]?[0-9][0-9]?)\b" validationOperator="or"/>
entities.name: IP Addresses
entities.description: File containing regular expressions to match IP addresses.  At the moment, this only locates IPv4 addresses.

entities.instruction:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<RegularExpression name="Company Names" pattern="(((\p{javaUpperCase}[a-zA-Z]{2,25}|&|and)[\ \-]){1,12}(?i)(?:p(?:roprietary limited|t(?:y(?: l(?:imited|td)|\. ltd)|e ltd)|vt(?:\. ltd\.| ltd)|lc)|c(?:redit union|o(?:rp(?:oration|)|mpany|\.))|inc(?:orporated|)|\(pty\) ltd|l(?:imited|\.l\.(?:c|p)|l(?:c|p)|td)|bank|P/L))\b" validationOperator="or"/>
entities.name: Company Names
entities.description: Matches proper-cased company names that end in common business suffixes, such as Pty Ltd, LLP, Inc. e.t.c.
